title: guruvAyur appanE kUvi
sahitya:
guruvAyur appanE kUvi azhaittAl varuvAi aruL niraivAi


anupallavi

  tiruvArUr pashu vaLattil shempon Alayattil uruvAna jyOtiyE ulagALum AdiyE


caraNam    nArAyaNA Om enrE pArAyaNam sheyyum nallanbar vaNangiDa selvangaLellAm IvAi tIrAda nOyellAm tIrkkum dayAparanE dInan kurai arindu tIrppAi aruL vizhi pArppAi ennai ErppAi uyar padam sErppAi Om sharaN
